mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from dispatch a where a.status = #{status} and a.slaverid = #{slaverid}
select * from dispatch a where a.slaverid = #{slaverid} and status =#{status} and plantype=#{plantype} order by id ASC limit ${maxthread}
select * from dispatch where slaverid = #{slaverid} and status =#{status} and plantype=#{plantype} and execplanid=#{execplanid} and batchname=#{batchname} order by id ASC limit 50
mapper.update: update dispatch set status=#{status} , lastmodify_time = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') where slaverid = #{slaverid} and execplanid = #{execplanid} and testcaseid = #{testcaseid} and batchid = #{batchid}
mapper.select: select * from dispatch a , executeplan b where a.status =#{status} and b.usetype=#{usetype} and b.runmode=#{runmode} and a.execplanid=#{execplanid} and a.batchname=#{batchname} order by a.id ASC limit 100
select * from dispatch a where a.status =#{status} order by a.id ASC limit 1
select * from dispatch a where a.status =#{status} and a.plantype=#{plantype} order by a.id ASC limit 1
select DISTINCT(slaverid) from dispatch where status =#{status} and plantype=#{plantype} and execplanid=#{execplanid} and batchname=#{batchname}
select DISTINCT(slaverid) from dispatch where status =#{status} and plantype=#{plantype} and execplanid=#{execplanid} and batchname=#{batchname} and testcaseid=#{testcaseid}

select COUNT(*) from dispatch a where a.status = #{status} and a.slaverid IN
#{slaver.slaverid}
mapper.update: update dispatch set status=#{status} , memo=#{memo}, lastmodify_time = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') where slaverid = #{slaverid} and execplanid = #{execplanid} and testcaseid = #{testcaseid} and batchid = #{batchid}
update dispatch set status=#{status} , lastmodify_time = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') where execplanid = #{execplanid} and batchname = #{batchname}
